document.author: JulSa_
document.text: Voici la mise à jour PlayStation Store du 17 Novembre 2010 . Cette mise à jour marque l’arrivée de Prince of Persia : The sands of Time en HD , mais aussi de Crazy Taxi 😀 PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Offres spéciales (Disponibles jusqu’au 24 novembre) TMNT: Turtle in Time Re-Shelled (prix initial – 9.99 € maintenant – 6.99 €) Cell Factor: Psychokinetic Wars (prix initial – 9.99 € maintenant – 6.99 €) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 12 – Battle of Forli (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.49 €) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 13 – Bonfire of the Vanities (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.49 €) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 13 – Bonfire of the Vanities & Secret Locations (prix initial – 6.99 € maintenant – 3.99 €) Assassin’s Creed: Bloodlines (PSP) (prix initial – 29.99 € maintenant – 19.99 €) Tom Clancy’s EndWar ( PSP) (prix initial – 19.99 € maintenant – 9.99 €) ChessMaster: The Art of Learning (PSP) (prix initial – 19.99 € maintenant – 9.99 €) Mystery of the Crystal Portal (mini) (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) Reductions permanentes du prix GTA: The Lost and Damned – maintenant 12.99 € Pro Cycling 2009™-Tour de France – maintenant 19.99 € Pro Cycling 2010™-Tour de France – maintenant 29.99 € Blood Bowl – maintenant 19.99 € Jeux téléchargeables (PS3) Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time HD (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Death Track: Resurrection + Anarchy: Rush Hour Bundle (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Red Faction: Guerrilla (19.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Crazy Taxi (9.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Jeux téléchargeables (PSP) CLADUN: This is an RPG! (19.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 DISGAEA Infinite (19.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Peggle (7.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Jeux PSone (PS3 et PSP) Critical Depth (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Gunship (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Sports Superbike 2 (3.59 €) Rating: PEGI 3 minis (PS3 et PSP) Who’s that Flying?! (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Applications (PS3) PlayTV Live Chat Upgrade (7.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Seulement disponible en France Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood – Copernicus Conspiracy (gratuit) Rating: PEGI 18 Comet Crash – Bionic Swarm (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 DJ Hero 2 – Electro Hits Mix Pack (7.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 EyePet – Music Styling Pack (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Fist Of The North Star: Ken’s Rage – Rei, Mamiya, Raoh Original Costumes (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Front Mission: Evolved – Wanzer Pack 3 (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Hustle Kings – Ball & Cue Pack (0.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 LittleBigPlanet – Birthday Cake (gratuit) Rating: PEGI 7 Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet – Captain America Collection (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 7 PAIN – H8 Squader Pack (0.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Space Invaders: Infinity Gene – Bonus Stage Pack 3 (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Super Street Fighter IV – Ultra Femme Fatale Pack (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Vanquish – Tri-Weapon Pack (1.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Worms 2: Armageddon – Worms 2: Armageddon Battle Pack (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock ‘Elected’ By Alice Cooper (1.99 €) ‘Limelight’ By Rush (1.99 €) ‘Love Song’ By Tesla (1.99 €) ‘Nothing To Say’ By Slash (With M Shadows) (1.99 €) ‘Poison’ By Alice Cooper (1.99 €) ‘Talk Dirty To Me’ By Poison (1.99 €) ‘Wagd’ By Slash (With Iggy Pop) (1.99 €) ‘Watch This’ By Slash (With Dave Grohl & Duff Mckagan) (1.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Rock Band 3 The Bee Gees Pack 01 (7.99 €) (Contient les titres énumérés ci-dessous qui sont disponibles également séparément) ‘Stayin’ Alive’ (1.49 €) ‘Tragedy’ (1.49 €) ‘You Should Be Dancing’ (1.49 €) ‘Jive Talkin » (1.49 €) ‘Night Fever’ (1.49 €) ‘Nights On Broadway’ (1.49 €) ‘Subdivisions’ by Rush (1.49 €) ‘The Thrill is Gone’ by BB King (1.49 €) ‘A Whiter Shade of Pale’ by Procol Harum (1.49 €) Aussi Disponibles: Rating: PEGI 12 Non disponibles au Luxembourg Rock Band Network ‘Curse you All Men!
